0.name: Blue Gandalf
0.description: A mystical enchanter with a cloak of cerulean, wielding ancient spells. Select for a journey guided by wisdom and the essence of the ethereal blue.

1.name: Drake
1.description: A colossal dragon with obsidian scales, wreathed in shadows. Choose for a fiery companion in your epic fantasy odyssey.

2.name: Revenant
2.description: A haunting figure with a skull head, draped in ethereal shadows. Pick for a chilling presence in your dark and mysterious adventure.

3.name: Golem Snickermack
3.description: A grinning goblin turned undead, wielding scavenged contraptions. Choose for an eerie twist in your fantasy quest.

4.name: Inferno Cranium
4.description: A blazing skull, wreathed in eternal flames. Opt for a scorching companion on your fiery journey through the realms of fantasy.

5.name: Commoner
5.description: An unassuming figure with a commonplace appearance, concealing extraordinary power. Choose for a surprising force to be reckoned with on your heroic quest.

6.name: Cosmic Voyager
6.description: A human with an otherworldly presence, marked by celestial origins. Select for an unearthly adventure in the cosmic realms of your fantasy world.

7.name: Crimson Guardian
7.description: A superhero clad in a sleek red suit, armed with valor and a burning determination to defend. Choose for a fiery force against injustice in your epic tale.
